targets.expr: clamp_min(floor(log2(machine_reserved{location="$location", name=~"D.+"} + on (location, name) (2 * machine_running) + on (location, name) (4 * machine_in_maintenance))), -1) + 1
clamp_min(floor(log2(machine_reserved{location="$location", name=~"W.+"} + on (location, name) (2 * machine_running) + on (location, name) (4 * machine_in_maintenance))), -1) + 1
machine_reserved{location="$location"} + on (location, name) (2 * machine_running) + on (location, name) (4 * machine_in_maintenance)

list.description: The Holland2Stay Location Code. Refer to the table for the mappings.
list.label: Location Code
list.name: location
